thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: New Development Bank says approves six new projects

title: New Development Bank says approves six new projects
text:
May 28, 2018 / 10:34 AM / Updated 35 minutes ago New Development Bank says approves six new projects Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
SHANGHAI, May 28 (Reuters) - The New Development Bank set up by the BRICS group of major emerging economies said on Monday that it has approved six new projects that take its loan book to $5.1 billion.
The bank, set up in 2015, made the announcement at its annual meeting in Shanghai. (Reporting by Brenda Goh Writing by John Ruwitch)
